thread.title: Prosource Donates Yoga Mats To Empower Women
thread.title_full: Prosource Donates Yoga Mats To Empower Women - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Prosource Donates Yoga Mats To Empower Women
text:
ProSource Partners with the Girls En Motion 1st Annual Women's Retreat in Arkansas
 LOS ANGELES, CA, October 02, ProSource, a maker of fitness equipment, will donate their popular Extra-Thick Yoga and Pilates Mats to encourage healthy, empowered women in the meetup group Girls En Motion (GEM). ProSource will provide a mat for every attendee of their first Annual Women's Retreat in Benton, Arkansas on September 25-28, 2015, to support members as they come together to practice fitness and yoga, learn ways to manage stress, and develop positive outlooks on life.
"We believe fitness and yoga contribute to overall wellness and fulfillment in life, and that strong women have a great ability to positively impact society," says Vice President Igor Finkelshteyn. "We are honored to participate in the GEM retreat, because we share their values of seeking out healthy lifestyles, building friendships, striving for greatness, and fulfilling their purposes."
ProSource's philosophy is that a person's achievements in life mean nothing without good health, and that healthy bodies contribute to mental and emotional health as well. Their passion for making a fit lifestyle accessible to everyone, and caring for the community, make this a natural partnership with Girls En Motion.
ProSource is a manufacturer and distributor of high performance, eco-friendly, and affordable fitness lifestyle products. Since 2010, Prosource has designed products based on their customer's needs and passions, for everything from yoga to cross-training to muscle recovery. The company's mission is to inspire and enable the achievement of fitness goals, and healthy, happy lives.
